product_name: Aquaglide Chinook XP Tandem XL Inflatable Kayak
long_description: Ideal for family use with plenty of room for 2 adults plus a child or gear with room to spare, the Chinook XP Tandem XL is an all-purpose recreational inflatable kayak the whole family will enjoy.
short_description: Ideal for family use with plenty of room for 2 adults plus a child or gear with room to spare, the Chinook XP Tandem XL is an all-purpose recreational inflatable kayak the whole family will enjoy.
